root: ^System：Except for when working and sleeping, the painter could check their backpack at any time, and they could <color=magenta>displace</color> anything at will.
^System：Understandably, the painter is <color=magenta>unwilling</color> to trade away some of the items that hold special significance to them.
^System：If there's nothing to displace, you can <color=green>take a stroll on the streets</color>. There's always something waiting for you to discover.
^System：After picking an item, <color=green>press and hold the displacement button</color> to <color=magenta>displace</color> it.
